member.name: M:ScoopInstance.IsVerbose
member.summary: Checks if scoop-search should run in verbose mode.

member.name: M:ScoopInstance.GetHomeDir
member.summary: Gets the home directory of the current user.

member.name: M:ScoopInstance.GetScoopConfigFilePath(System.String)
member.summary: Path to the scoop config file.

member.name: M:ScoopInstance.GetScoopHome(Flow.Launcher.Plugin.Scoop.Entity.Settings)
member.summary: Returns the path to the root of scoop. Logic follows Scoop's logic for resolving the home directory.

member.name: M:ScoopInstance.LoadInstance(Flow.Launcher.Plugin.Scoop.Entity.Settings)
member.summary: Loads the Scoop instance, including home path, config file path, and icon.

member.name: M:ScoopInstance.LoadIcon(System.String)
member.summary: Loads the Scoop icon from the specified path.
